abstract: Google will start personalizing the search results of people who use the service without logging in, a move that may raise privacy concerns.
snippet: Google will start personalizing the search results of people who use the service without logging in, a move that may raise privacy concerns.
lead_paragraph: For many of its users, Google offers Web search results that are customized based on their previous search history and clicks. For example, if someone consistently favors a particular sports site, Google will put that site high in the results when they look up sports topics in its search engine.

headline.main: Google Customizes More of Its Search Results
